memberdef.name: nfs3_Mknod

detaileddescription.para: Implements NFSPROC3_COMMIT. Unused for now, but may be supported later.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] credentials to be used for this request
[IN] pointer to SVC request related to this call
[OUT] pointer to the structure to contain the result of the call

detaileddescription.para: nfs3_Mknod_Free: Frees the result structure allocated for nfs3_Mknod.
Frees the result structure allocated for nfs3_Mknod.
